job_tasks.phrase: het verbeteren van hun AI-modellen door menselijke feedback te leveren
job_tasks.justification: The phrase directly refers to improving AI models through human feedback, which is a core aspect of model training and refinement.
This phrase explicitly states the task of training large language models, a key component of generative AI work.

job_tasks.phrase: helpen geavanceerde generatieve AI-modellen betere code te schrijven
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in the process of improving generative AI models, specifically their ability to write code.

job_tasks.phrase: interactie vereisen met deze modellen terwijl ze leren coderen
job_tasks.justification: This describes direct interaction with AI models during their learning process, which is part of model training and evaluation.

job_tasks.phrase: Het maken en beantwoorden van vragen met betrekking tot informatica om AI-modellen te helpen trainen.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves creating and answering computer science-related questions to aid in AI model training, directly contributing to the modeling process.

job_tasks.phrase: Het evalueren en rangschikken van code die door AI-modellen wordt gegenereerd.
job_tasks.justification: This involves assessing and ranking the output of AI models, which is a crucial part of model evaluation and improvement.

soft_skills.phrase: Er is geen eerdere ervaring met AI vereist.
flexibele werkuren, zodat je kunt werken wanneer het jou het beste uitkomt.

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes training and improving generative AI models, specifically large language models, by providing feedback and evaluating generated code. The core tasks revolve around interaction with these models during their learning process, aligning directly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer focused on language models.
